mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Committee for Rubin Thompson, declared a lunatic
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Committee for Rubin Thompson, declared a lunatic T. W. Williams, former Sheriff of Floyd County and as such the committee for Rubin Thompson Recorded in Ledger Book 4, Page 108, in the Floyd County Courthouse
